Control Name: Reviews Physical Access—Processes are in place to periodically review physical access to ensure consistency with job responsibilities.

control_attributes.Control: Reviews Physical Access—Processes are in place to periodically review physical access to ensure consistency with job responsibilities.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC6.4 The entity restricts physical access to facilities and protected information assets (for example, data center facilities, back-up media storage, and other sensitive locations) to authorized personnel to meet the entity’s objectives.
